summary: This is an email chain from July 24, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It contains a report from a forensic psychologist that Epstein claimed his cellmate was told by guards that if he assaulted Epstein, they would not file a report. The email seeks confirmation from the Chief Psychologist regarding Epstein's competency.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by number #76318-054, who reported a threat from his cellmate allegedly encouraged by guards.

connections.description: LT, a forensic psychologist, is reporting a claim made by inmate Jeffrey Epstein regarding a threat from his cellmate.

events.title: Epstein reports threat from cellmate
events.description: Epstein reported to forensic psychologist LT that his cellmate told him guards said they would not file a report if the cellmate assaulted him.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: The federal prison where Jeffrey Epstein was held as an inmate.

keyFacts: On July 24, 2019, inmate Jeffrey Epstein reported a threat: his cellmate told him guards said they would not file a report if the cellmate assaulted him.
The report was made by a forensic psychologist (LT) from the U.S. Public Health Service working at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The email chain includes a request for the Chief Psychologist to confirm agreement on a matter related to Epstein's competency.
The document is official correspondence marked as potentially containing SENSITIVE information, indicating internal prison communications about Epstein's safety.
